xbrlcore.linkbase
Class DefinitionLinkbase

java.lang.Object
  xbrlcore.linkbase.Linkbase
      xbrlcore.linkbase.DefinitionLinkbase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DefinitionLinkbase
extends Linkbase

This class represents the definition linkbase of a DTS. This is most important for so called template taxonomies, where the definition linkbase indicates whether a certain combination of dimension/domain member (a Hypercube) is allowed for a specific primary item or not.

For more information please see the XBRL Dimensions 1.0 Specification, which can be obtained from http://www.xbrl.org/SpecRecommendations/.

Author:
Daniel Hamm
See Also:

Constructor Detail

DefinitionLinkbase

public DefinitionLinkbase(DiscoverableTaxonomySet dts)
Parameters:
dts - The taxonomy this linkbase belongs to.
Method Detail

buildDefinitionLinkbase

public void buildDefinitionLinkbase()
                             throws TaxonomyCreationException,
                                    XBRLException
This method builds the definition linkbase. More detailed, this method creates the according Dimension and Hypercube objects. For each dimension, it determines the correct domain member network.

Throws:
TaxonomyCreationException - This exception is thrown if a wrong substitutionGroup is detected or if a domain member network of an explicit dimension could not be determined.
XBRLException

getHypercube

public Hypercube getHypercube(Concept concept)
This method returns a hypercube the given Concept object refers to.

Parameters:
concept - The Concept object representing the hypercube.
Returns:
The hypercube which is represented by the given Concept object.

dimensionAllowed

public boolean dimensionAllowed(Concept primaryConcept,
                                MultipleDimensionType currDimensionCombination,
                                java.lang.String contextElement)
                         throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException,
                                XBRLException
Indicates whether a certain primary item is allowed for a specific combination of dimensions/domain member or not. This information is essential to model the white and grey cells of the according templates.

Parameters:
primaryConcept - The Concept object representing the primary element.
currDimensionCombination - The MultipleDimensionType object representing the current dimension and domain member as well as all previous dimensions and domain member.
contextElement - "scenario" or "segment", depending on the part of the context that shall be tested.
Returns:
True if the combination is allowed for the primary item, otherwise false.
Throws:
java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
XBRLException

getDimensionTaxonomy

public java.util.Set getDimensionTaxonomy(Concept dimensionElement)
dimensionElement is a dimension element of substitution group xbrldt:dimensionItem. The method determines the according dimension taxonomy. There can be several dimension taxonomies, since one element can be comprised of multiple dimensions (see COREP taxonomy t-cs for an example).

Returns:
A set with TaxonomySchema objects of which the dimension represented by dimensionElement is comprised.

getDimensionElement

public Concept getDimensionElement(Concept domainElement)
This method returns the dimension element (substitutionGroup xbrldt:dimensionItem) to a given domain element by parsing the Hypercubes.

Parameters:
domainElement - Domain element for which the dimension element is searched.
Returns:
The dimension element if it is found, null otherwise.

isUsableDomainMemberOfDimension

public boolean isUsableDomainMemberOfDimension(Concept dimensionConcept,
                                               Concept domainMemberConcept)
This method checks whether a specific concept is a *usable* domain member to a specific dimension (not taking a specific hypercube into account) in a hypercube which is an ALL-Hypercube within any extended link role.

Parameters:
dimensionConcept - Possible domain member.
domainMemberConcept - Dimension the possible domain member belongs to.
Returns:
True if domainMemberConcept is a domain member of dimensionConcept.

getDimensionConceptSet

public java.util.Set getDimensionConceptSet()
Returns:
Returns all dimension elements (substitution group xbrldt:dimensionItem) of this definition linkbase. The set contains Concept objects.

getHypercubeSet

public java.util.Set getHypercubeSet()
Returns:
Returns all hypercubes (represented by elements with the substitution group xbrldt:hypercubeItem) of this definition linkbase. The Set contains Hypercube objects.
